situation: A circular gate 1.5m in diameter is inclined at an angle of 45ยบ. Fresh water stands on one side of the gate to a height of 10m. above the center of the gate.

subquestions.question: Evaluate the total force on the gate.
Locate the point of action of the total force from the bottom on the plane of the gate.
If the gate is hinged at the top, evaluate the force normal to the gate at the bottom required to open it in kN.
